title: Ultimate Bravery

embed.description: Ultimate Bravery is a way to play League of Legends. You will be given a randomized hero, spells and items, to make your games more spicy! Be brave! Join the Ultimate Bravery challenge!

body: Anyone want to do a 5 person premade UltimateBravery Game?

replies.body:
Oh God.
That's all I can say.
? its fun and a challenge of adaptability
ik, but like, just that, you know.... Good Luck
Ayyy another brave, did you want to add me so we can build a team when we are both on?
You should ask people if they want cancer very fast
so proving yourself to be able to win even with random builds is cancer? I see it as skill, only cancer if you have no skill to overcome the challenge. simple fact of life
This site ... is the reason for trolls in this world.

troll shmoll, if I am to be honest, the fiora build/masteries/spells actually gave me one of the best games with her (can't say that mao wasnt retard tho) and the Diana build worked well, beat olaf with leo. This isn't troll, its proving yourself
